thread.section_title: HelloFresh US Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of HelloFresh US | hellofresh.com | 20 of 288
thread.title: Rose

author: Rose
title: Rose
text:
I have been receiving Hello Fresh for about 2 months and I get so excited when it arrives I actually want to cook. The recipes are delicious, sometimes they are a little hard to read but if you read all of the recipe before you start you shouldn't have any problem.
The produce is as their name implies "FRESH" . Their meat products are top grade and there is also Premium meats you can order with some of the recipes, they cost a little more but it is worth it.
I have reduced my food cost by $200. a week just from ordering 3 meals from Hello Fresh. And no more wasted food from buying a grocery store amount but not needing it all for the recipe.
